title: Premiere: Mute – Fire//Exotic Lovers
body:
It’s only been a couple of weeks and 2 more cuts from the still allusive **Mute** drop into my inbox.

The game has changed, _Fire_ and _Exotic Lovers_ are longer, dustier and more danceable and yet also manage to holds the mystery that first cut Here I Am held so tightly to its chest. Although there’s certainly a missing element from the tracks, most probably an MC, the sonic comparisons to **Mos Def** and early **Gonjasufi** productions make it hard not to be more than a little intrigued as to where Mute will take us in the future.
